import MyNavbar from "../../components/navbar/MyNavbar"; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import './AddArticle.css'; import axios from "axios"; import { useState } from "react"; function AddArticle(){ const [formData, setFormData] = useState({}) const formHandler = (e, propertyName) => { setFormData({...formData ,[propertyName]: e.target.value}) } const addArticleHandler = () => { axios.post('http://localhost:8000/articles', formData) } return( <>
Article Title Short explanation Writer Article Topic Image Article Time of reading
) } export default AddArticle;
